documents.document: Fellow citizens, we cannot escape history Abe Lincoln
#quotes It is not clear that intelligence has any long-term survival value.
"Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else." - Les Brown
Your greatest resource is your time. Brian Tracy
#quotes Good management consists in showing average people how to do the work of superior people.
Good management consists in showing average people how to do the work of superior people. John D. Rockefeller
#quotes I don't want to be left behind. In fact, I want to be here before the action starts.
Luck? Sure. But only after long practice and only with the ability to think under pressure. Babe Didrikson Zaharias
#quotes Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
There was a time when a fool and his money were soon parted, but now it happens to everybody. Adlai E. Stevenson
#quotes Broke is normal. Why be normal?
#quotes Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do. John Wooden
The leading rule for the lawyer, as for the man of every other calling, is diligence. Leave nothing for to-morrow which can be done to-day.
#quotes Climate change poses clear, catastrophic threats. We may not agree on the extent, but we certainly can't afford the risk of inaction
Leaders need to be optimists. Their vision is beyond the present. Rudy Giuliani
#quotes We are all wrong so often that it amazes me that we can have any conviction at all over the direction of things to come. But we must
#quotes Only those who are asleep make no mistakes.
If there is anything that a man can do well, I say let him do it. Give him a chance. Abraham Lincoln
A friend's envy is worse than an enemy's hatred.AmericanProverb
As I grow older, I pay less attention to what men say. I just watch what they do. Andrew Carnegie
#quotes I've been blessed to find people who are smarter than I am, and they help me to execute the vision I have.
The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing. Albert Einstein
A broken hand can work but a broken heart can't. Afghan Proverb
There is enough in the world for everyone's need, but not enough for everyone's greed. - Frank Buchman
#quotes Success is not for the timid. It is for those who seek guidance, make decisions, and take decisive action.
To be successful, you must decide exactly what you want to accomplish; then resolve to pay the price to get it. Bunker Hunt
Money demands that you sell, not your weakness to men's stupidity, but your talent to their reason. Ayn Rand
An adult is only one who has ceased to grow vertically and started to grow horizontally.AmericanProverb
One thing at a time, is my motto - and just play that thing for all it is worth, even if it's only two pair and a jack. Mark Twain
#quotes You look for stars. You look for the makeup of artists who can have long lasting careers and who could be headliners.
Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well. JIM ROHN
#quotes In spite of your fear, do what you have to do.
Victory belongs to the most persevering. Napoleon Bonaparte
Unless a man undertakes more than he possibly can do, he will never do all that he can. Henry Drummond
Those who wish to sing, always find a song. Swedish Proverb
#quotes All of us perform better and more willingly when we know why we're doing what we have been told or asked to do.
"Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised." - Denis Waitley Dr
There are only about a half dozen things that make 80% of the difference in any area of our lives. JIM ROHN
It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness. Seneca
Keep your thinking right And your business will be right. Zig Ziglar
Courage is fear that has said its prayers AmericanProverb
#quotes Sometimes it is better to lose and do the right thing than to win and do the wrong thing.
Don't listen to their words, fix your attention on their deeds. Albert Einstein
I rate enthusiasm even above professional skill. Edward Appleton
The dog I bought, bit me; the fire I kindled, burned me. Ethiopian Proverb
People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathingthat's why we recommend it daily. Zig Ziglar
Opportunity often comes disguised in the form of misfortune, or temporary defeat. Napoleon Hill
#quotes As you get bigger, you have to learn to delegate. Its also an excellent way to get staff involved in the companys operations.
Where you start is not as important as where you finish. Zig Ziglar
#quotes Everyone who got where he is has had to begin where he was.
#quotes A real entrepreneur is somebody who has no safety net underneath them.
Success is not permanent. The same is also true of failure. Dell Crossword
#quotes Where the willingness is great, the difficulties cannot be great.
The highest art of professional management requires the literal ability to 'smell' a 'real fact' from all others. Harold S Geneen
There is no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs. Author unknown
Happiness is not a goal, it is a by-product. Eleanor Roosevelt
If relatives help each other, what harm can be done to them? Ethiopian Proverb
#quotes I wish it grew on trees, but it takes hard work to make money.
#quotes Money will buy you a bed, but not a good night's sleep, a house but not a home, a companion but not a friend.
#quotes Young people tell what they are doing, old people what they have done and fools what they wish to do.
The highest proof of virtue is to possess boundless power without abusing it. Lord Macaulay
If you keep working you'll last longer and I just want to keep vertical. I'd hate to spend the rest of my life trying to outwit an 18-inch f
Unless you change how you are, you will always have what youve got. Unknown
Flourish like a flower, but may your life be longer. Afghan Proverb
#quotes If you don't have daily objectives, you qualify as a dreamer.
Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there. Bo Jackson
I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones. Albert Einstein
#quotes Whenever there is a hard job to be done I assign it to a lazy man; he is sure to find an easy way of doing it.
#quotes I just lucked into things. I used to think that if I made $50,000 I'd be the happiest guy in the world.
The outer conditions of a person's life will always be found to reflect their inner beliefs - James Allen
The flower has no front or back. Afghan Proverb
When in doubt, mumble; when in trouble, delegate; when in charge, ponder. James H. Boren
Success is getting what you want; happiness is wanting what you get. Dale Carnegie
Without haste, but without rest. Goethe
#quotes The way you see them is the way you treat them and the way you treat them is the way they often become.
#quotes Taxes are not good things, but if you want services, somebody's got to pay for them so they're a necessary evil.
A tilted load won't reach its destination. Afghan Proverb
Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves. Abe Lincoln
#quotes The good things take care of themselves. We want to find all the negatives.
Paying attention to simple little things that most men neglect makes a few men rich. Henry Ford
#quotes Achievement is largely the product of steadily raising one's levels of aspiration . . and expectation.
The only way to find the limits of the possible is by going beyond them to the impossible. Arthur C. Clarke
In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield. Warren Buffett
U can close more bus. n 2 months by becoming interested n other people than U can in 2 yrs by trying 2 get people interested in U. Carnegie
If one is not in a hurry, even an egg will start walking. Ethiopian Proverb
One who runs alone cannot be outrun by another. Ethiopian Proverb
A blind person knows his environment more than a visitor with eyes. African Congo Proverb
If you are going to go where corn grows, take a cutting tool with you. Ethiopian Proverb
A friend is easier lost than found.AmericanProverb
Clean around your own back door before you clean around someone else's. AmericanProverb
#quotes Kids go where there is excitement. They stay where there is love. Zig Ziglar
#quotes We believe ranchers and farmers and family business owners can make better decisions about the future than the government can.
Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity. Coach Darrel Royal
#quotes Technology is always evolving, and companies.. not just search companies.. can't be afraid to take advantage of change.
#quotes You can finish school, and even make it easy -but you never finish your education,and it's seldom easy.
#quotes The art of leadership is saying no, not yes. It is very easy to say yes.
#quotes Don't let anyone say you can't do it.
Unless a man undertakes more than he possibly can do, he will never do all that he can. Henry Drummond
#quotes Hell, there are no rules here, we're trying to accomplish something.
